entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
